title: DATS Dataset Schema
description: A set of dimensions about an entity being observed. A collection of data, published or curated by a single agent, and available for access or download in one or more formats (from DCAT: http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/#Class:_Dataset). A body of structured information describing some topic(s) of interest (from: http://schema.org/Dataset).

title.description: one sentence, usually short description of an entity, here the dataset

description.description: a textual narrative, comprised of one or more statements describing the dataset

type.description: a term, ideally from a controlled terminology, identifying the nature of the data, placing it in a typology

conformsTo.description: a property used to indicate if the dataset meets the requirements and constraints defined by specific community data standard

storedIn.description: a property used to specify the data repository(ies) hosting the dataset

hasPartDimension.description: a property used to identify, specify and list the different dimensions (granular components)  making up a dataset.

isCitedBy.description: a property used to specify links to relevant publication(s)

license.description: a property used to specify relevant terms of usage and license

downloadURL.description: a property used to specify a URL where the dataset can be obtained

producedBy.description: a property used to associate a study process which generated a given dataset, if any

isAboutBiologicalProcess.description: a property used to specify the biological processes relevant to the study, ideally from a controlled vocabulary/ontology

creator.description: a property to list the person(s) or organization(s) which contributed to the creation of the dataset.

version.description: an optional property used to specify a release point for the dataset when applicable

access.description: The information about access level for the dataset.

size.description: a property used to specify the size of the dataset
